es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.item.sim

Class ItemSimilarity<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.item.sim.ItemSimilarity<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, FastItemIndex<I>, Similarity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SetCosineItemSimilarity, SetJaccardItemSimilarity, VectorCosineItemSimilarity, VectorJaccardItemSimilarity

    public abstract class ItemSimilarity<I>
extends Object
implements Similarity, FastItemIndex<I>
    Item similarity. It wraps a generic fast similarity and a fast item index.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
